pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 80  $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() $(br)ranged: 5 on easy, 8 on normal, 12 on hard, $(br)melee: 2, 3 on hard $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Hostile     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Ocean Monuments $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)The $(thing)Elder Guardian$() has 3 methods of attacking, including firing its laser, inflicting $(thing)Mining Fatigue$(), and a defensive thorn-like attack.
$(n)Drops:$() 0-2 Prismarine Shards, 1 Wet Sponge, 2.5% random fish, 1/3 chance of Prismarine Crystals $(br)$(n)XP:$() 10
